instructions_place_signature: Click on the PDF to place your signature
instructions_add_signature: Add your signature to the document
desc_place_signature: Click anywhere on the document to place your prepared signature at that location.

desc_add_signature: Use the toolbar buttons below to create your signature, or click directly on the document to open the signature creation popup.
